body.name: Daycare Labels Baby Bottle Labels 720 PCS,School Supplies, Twelve Animal Designs Dishwasher Safe Stickers and Kids' Stuff Reusable,Bottle Labels, 1×1.5 Inch
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 10 mins
features: Easily Organize and Identify: Our daycare labels make it simple to organize your baby's food, breast milk, and bottles. With these removable labels, you can easily write names and dates for quick identification.
Ample Space for Information: The baby bottle labels feature a generous amount of space to record the date and contents inside using markers or pens. Keep track of what's inside without any hassle.

Plenty of Labels: In this pack, you will receive 24 sheets of daycare bottle stickers, with a total of 720 labels. Each sheet features 24 stickers with 12 various animal designs. You'll never run out of labels for all your daycare and home use needs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Baby day care bottle label Use this set of 720 baby bottle labels at home, daycare and preschool. Keep a record of breast milk, baby food and bottles! Each blank label measures 1.5 x 1 inch and has plenty of writing space. In addition, each sticker has cute animals. , leaving no residue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars handy daycare bottle labels
reviews.reviewText: Just bought these for my kid's daycare needs, here's my thoughts:Pros:Really easy to write on, marker doesn’t smudge.Cute animal designs, my kid loves them.Good adhesive, they stick well on bottles and containers.Perfect size, not too big or small.Huge pack, 500 labels is plenty for long use.Cons:Sometimes hard to peel off the sheet.Adhesive could be stronger for dishwasher use.More variety in designs would be nicer.Can get a bit wet and start to peel off.Need permanent marker, regular pen might fade.Overall:These are pretty great for organizing my baby’s bottles for daycare. They're cute and functional. They could stick a bit better, especially after washing, but overall, they do the job well. Definitely makes life easier for labeling everything!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy
reviews.reviewText: These bottle labels are very light in color and if you want to choose blue the blue is not even dark. These are not even waterproof and it's hard to come off the bottle so now you have to get some Goo gone or some dishwashing liquid just to get the stickiness off no I don't want something that's difficult just to take off the bottle and it's not even waterproof

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not accurately described
reviews.reviewText: These stickers are cute and stick well, but that’s where my love for these end. They are NOT waterproof. They’re NOT dishwasher safe. They ARE a pain in the rear to remove once they get water logged. If you are looking to label containers and you remember to remove the stickers before they get wet, you can reuse them. I won’t be ordering these again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So first off this is an Amazon Vine review, meaning I received this product essentially for free in exchange for writing an honest review.I will be honest I’ve only used one sticker and probably won’t use the others for quite a few years as currently my son is being watched at home by his grandmother (with no plans of day care till he’s at least 2), but the stickers are incredibly cute and seem like they should hold up quite well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Don’t put these on things you want to wash
reviews.reviewText: Received them damaged and couldn’t use the first sheet, which not a huge deal since there was plenty more. They have decent designs and it’s nice that there’s 2 sizes to choose from. They stick well to cardboard or plastic but not good for sticking on clothes tags or tags for stuffed animals, mesh packing cubes, pacifier holder stuffies, etc… I used a sharpie pen to write on them, so that could be why they smudged easily if I didn’t wait at least 30 seconds to take off the label and apply to whatever I needed to. I put these on my son’s bottles for daycare and as soon as I washed them the next day they were ruined. So glad I put them at the bottom and not anywhere visible since the residue I have to clean off isn’t pretty now that these practically dissolved after 3 washes. I use a bottle brush and lightly scrub the outside so it’s not like I used a dish sponge for this to have happened so soon. I ordered personalized ones that state they are waterproof so hopefully those work better for anything that I need to wash or run through the laundry. I’m just keeping these as backup and to use on stuff that I’ll eventually be tossing like his diaper cream tubes or teething gels and diaper/wipe packs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First of all I need to say that these have not been tried on baby bottles. I don't know if what they say about rewashing etc. is true but I have to reason to doubt them. There are 720 baby bottle labels so you can use them to label a multitude of things. They are very cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor design, does not last.
reviews.reviewText: These labels are very bad. They get destroyed from handwashing even after a few times. Other people are looking over this part and think well I have 720 of them so I can replace them. Well there this product fails as well. When you peel off the old sticker it leaves a residue that does not come off with regular washing. I have to use harsh chemicals such as rubbing alcohol or acetone to take it off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars They Aren't Water Resistant
reviews.reviewText: They work as labels, but not really well for bottle labels. They don't have the water proof sheet over them, so they get really messed up in water.
